body_html: @jhseu BTW, the way Caffe deals with turbo is that it just uses OpenCV, which comes with it. I'm not sure about whether other frameworks upgraded to turbo (Torch hasn't, I know that almost for sure), but that assembly code base makes for a complex build for sure.

body: @jhseu BTW, the way Caffe deals with turbo is that it just uses OpenCV, which comes with it. I'm not sure about whether other frameworks upgraded to turbo (Torch hasn't, I know that almost for sure), but that assembly code base makes for a complex build for sure.
